item.title: How to Undo and Redo in the Microsoft Sticky Notes App (Windows 11)
item.description: This tutorial covers: How to Undo: With Right Click With Keyboard Shortcut How to Redo: With Right Click With Keyboard Shortcut No time to scroll down? Click through this presentation tutorial: Watch a tutorial video: How to Undo With Right Click Step 1: First edit a sticky note. Right click anywhere in the note. Step 2: In the menu that opens, click “Undo”. The previous action is reversed. How to Undo With Keyboard Shortcut Step 1: Edit a sticky note.
